title: Bonus: Wild Work Advice with Cheryl Strayed
description: We’re constantly seeking advice about our work lives. Which job offer to take. When to quit. Whether to blow the whistle on a bad boss. But so much of the advice we get—and give—turns out to be bad. For some sage advice, Adam sought out master advice-giver Cheryl Strayed, the author of Wild.
itunes:subtitle: For some sage advice, Adam sought out master advice-giver Cheryl Strayed, the author of Wild.
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
itunes:author: TED
